page.title: 08RELIGION IN GRANGE/BUTETOWN
page.content:
{Churches in the area: {a)}St.Samson's and St.Dyfrig's (179755) Church in Wales. {b)}Baptist Church Rutland Street (174755) also used as a clinic. {c)}Saltmead Presbyterian Church (174755). {d)}Greek Orthodox Church (174755) only used at Christmas and Easter. {e)}St.Mary the Virgin (186757) Church in Wales. {f)}The Noor-Ul-Islam Mosque (189751). {g)}Welcome Mission (189751) all nationalities.
In a{survey}undertaken, about 30% of the people said they were Catholic, about 30% said they were Church of England and about 40% said they were non-believers. Of those who went to church, about 50% said they went every week, while 50% attended occasionally.
